title: Episode #1.1
description: Laura Hawkins begins to suspect there's something unusual about their family 'Synth' Anita.

title: Episode #1.2
description: Niska stages a brutal escape from the brothel; Leo's secret is revealed; George is horrified to be given a new Synth.

title: Episode #1.3
description: Anita saves Toby's life; George tries to break free; Pete is angry at the brothel-murder cover-up.

title: Episode #1.4
description: Laura insists the family take Anita for testing; Leo gets one step closer to finding Mia; Niska gets revenge.

title: Episode #1.5
description: Killer Synth is the breaking news story, and public panic is growing; Joe's secret threatens to destroy the family.

title: Episode #1.6
description: With Joe in exile and the kids tired of their parents' lies, Laura decides it's time to tell the truth.

title: Episode #1.7
description: Karen sets out to George's house to find Niska; Pete is determined to find out who Karen is.

title: Episode #1.8
description: With the Synths in captivity, the devastated Hawkins realise how much Mia means to them.

title: Episode #2.1
description: Niska is living as a fugitive in Berlin, while the other Synths are laying low in the UK.

title: Episode #2.2
description: Karen and Pete learn about a special Synth being sold on the black market; Mia risks exposing her secret to help Ed.

title: Episode #2.3
description: Athena arrives in the UK; Niska's consciousness assessments begin.

title: Episode #2.4
description: Mia and Ed's relationship is threatened; Things looks bleak for Niska when Laura calls a surprise witness.

title: Episode #2.5
description: Mia is forced to take drastic action; Hester and Leo locate the silo; Pete locates the valuable stolen Seraph.

title: Episode #2.6
description: Athena challenges Milo over his ethics, and is shocked whine he reveals his plan; Max starts a new community of synths.

title: Episode #2.7
description: Mattie asks Max to help save Leo from Hester's influence; Toby receives a disturbing message.

title: Episode #2.8
description: Hester seeks revenge on Leo; Karen takes matters in her own hands; Joe makes a shocking confession to Laura.

title: Episode #3.1
description: 1 year after the dawning of synth consciousness, Leo is still in a coma leaving Max, Mia and Flash to broker an uneasy peace with the fearful human world. Laura's fight for synth rights receives an unexpected boost.

title: Episode #3.2
description: A police raid on the Railyard leaves Max dealing with the fall-out from his life-or-death decision. The situation worsens when Agnes begins an anti-human campaign. Laura discovers an operation that could threaten synth survival.

title: Episode #3.3
description: Laura struggles to uncover the truth about Operation Basswood; Mattie and Leo confront their feelings for each other.

title: Episode #3.4
description: Laura leads a tense visit of the Dryden Commission to the Railyard, but Agnes's anger may threaten success. Mia confronts her past when she meets Ed. A night out turns to tragedy.

title: Episode #3.5
description: Truths are revealed and dangerous plans are put into action at the Railyard.

title: Episode #3.6
description: Laura and Leo discover shocking and painful truths; Niska continues on her mysterious journey.

title: Episode #3.7
description: Laura reels from her heartbreaking decision; Niska's journey takes an unexpected turn.

title: Episode #3.8
description: Humans and Synths go head-to-head; Laura, Niska and Mattie face major decisions.
